item.title: Trump admin live updates: Attorney General Bondi to visit Alcatraz, officials say
item.description: Attorney General Pam Bondi and Interior Secretary Doug Burgum are in California making a visit to the former federal prison Alcatraz, officials confir...

item.title: 17-year-old arrested in murder of Maine paddleboarder
item.description: An arrest has been made in the murder of Sunshine Stewart, a paddleboarder who went missing in Maine earlier this month.

item.title: Plane crash kills 1 and injures 2 in remote area of Olympic National Park
item.description: At least one person is dead and two others have been injured in a small plane crash in a remote area of Olympic National Park in Washington, authoriti...

item.title: WATCH: Mysterious Pride flag-wearing robot spotted in Hollywood
item.description: Some California motorists were shocked to see a cowboy hat-wearing robot draped in Pride flags running through West Hollywood.

item.title: WATCH: Stealthy squirrel steals chicken snack from stroller at EPCOT
item.description: "Good for you, bud," one impressed onlooker could be heard saying as the crafty critter made its getaway.
